title: An Idea... (Big enough for its own topic)
content:
I've been noticing a lot of more personal topics in the misc forum lately; topics involving people, pictures of people, and places involved with these people... and that got me thinking:

Why not move those posts to a new "Keeners" forum, all about us! A forum for bragging, just talking at poeple about your life and delemas, and a central location for those "Where do you live" "What did you do" forum.

The misc forum can be for anything else; e.g. Computer probs, best restaurants in Australia, news, and polotics...

Keeners (About you, not your opinions - save it for misc)

Miscellaneous - For Misc conversations


What do y'all think?Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/tough_guys_wear_pink.jpg[/img]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: An Idea... (Big enough for its own topic)
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Why not move those posts to a new "Keeners" forum, all about us! A forum for bragging, just talking at poeple about your life and delemas, and a central location for those "Where do you live" "What did you do" forum.[hr][/quote]
This already exists...

It's called MySpace.

Seriously, the people on the PCKF aren't egotistical enough (Djaser excluded.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] ) to go BRAGGING about themselves.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

title: Re: An Idea... (Big enough for its own topic)
content:
Well, that sort of thing happens enough in miscellaneous already. I don't think we need such a forum. It's enough if the person just links his page or blog or such in his/her profile. Too many sub forums is just annoying, there's already quite a bit of them.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: An Idea... (Big enough for its own topic)
content:
Gal, what makes you think I'm so egoistic?

Ontopic, personal chatting and chatting about me mostly happens spontaneous a special forum therefore would probably not work.
I also agree that to many subforums are annoying, we already have some that are barely used.

title: Re: An Idea... (Big enough for its own topic)
content:
Yeah, blogs are probably a lot more suitable for that.
Of course those are usually a single person's "property", but they usually have the option for visitors to respond to updates, which can lead to threads similar to those in a forum.

For ad hoc conversations I recently found [url=http://www.gabbly.com/]Gabbly Chat[/url], which is one of those programs that adds a chat feature to any website.
Try [url=http://gabbly.com/www.pckf.com/]gabbly.com/www.pckf.com[/url] for a chat for this forum/site.
(I used the pckf.com, since ezboard itself doesn't have the friendliest of URLs.)
Basically this adds a small box where you can chat.
Just clicking links leaves the chat window.
Opening threads in a new window/tab leaves the chat in the original window, not in the new one.
It also seems to remember the last X messages in a history, so it's somewhat similar to a Shoutbox as well.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

You can still talk about yourself in other forums, but the "Photo of yourself" topic goes there.Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!

title: EGO THREAD!!!!!!!
content:
EGO THREAD!!!!!!!


I AM SO AWESOME

THIS WEEK I HAD AN ANIMATION EXAM ("KEY CLEAN-UP") ALL WEEK LONG!!!!
I KNOW!!11

THEN I CAUGHT A COLD!1

THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED RIGHT AFTER MY CLEAN-UP EXAM LAST YEAR TOO! DO EXAM - CATCH A COLD! SPOOKY HUH???? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dexter.gif[/img] ----------
www.StrifeStrips.com! Woot! We're back, baby!

title: Re: EGO THREAD!!!!!!!
content:
So a cold followed up your exam last year, and now a cold followed up your exam again this year?
That just has to mean something, that can't be random anymore, that just has to mean that I, in fact, am awesome.
(Yay ego thread?)Retodon8
